nozzle_temperature_notes: we want the nozzle hotter for maximum strength.
we can also assum the 0.8 nozzle is probably going to be used when strength is paramount,
as it reduces layer lines (if printed at higher layer heights).
So for 0.8 nozzle we use a higher temperature:
compatible_printers_condition: nozzle_diameter[0]==0.8 or nozzle_diameter[1]==0.8 or nozzle_diameter[2]==0.8 or nozzle_diameter[3]==0.8
filament_settings_id: PowerMedia PLA @Creality Ender-3 Pro 0.8 brass nozzle
name: PowerMedia PLA
